title: Web Developer and Designer
name: Bashar Abdullah
description: I am a web designer and developer. I help companies and brands enhance their online presence. I also work on improving search engine optimization to make the website rank highly in search results. I have experience in building projects from scratch, starting with server setup and database design, all the way to creating a beautiful and smooth user interface.
service_1_desc: Full-stack website development, starting from database design and application structure to interactive front-end design.
service_2_desc: Website design is the phase preceding development, creating the visual appearance for users. It involves choosing colors, shapes, and fonts to achieve a beautiful and cohesive design that serves the project's message.
service_3_desc: I offer Search Engine Optimization (SEO) service, which involves applying various optimizations and modifications to the website to make it appear on the first pages of search results.
service_4_desc: Making the website suitable for all screen sizes, especially mobile devices, is crucial for the site's success. This is what I do during the design and development of your website.
service_5_desc: To provide the best possible service to the client, I offer continuous support during and after the project's completion.
project_3_desc: This is a website for a limousine service company in Kuwait. The purpose of the website is to introduce the company and its services, and showcase the available cars for users to choose from. Users can also request specific cars with all the details. The project consists of a front-end interface and a .NET backend server.
project_1_desc: A store similar to Amazon in terms of design and some other key features.
project_2_desc: A landing page for a website dedicated to cats and pets, inspired by an official site. It includes responsive design and some other features.
